title: Piasso
description: I had the idea for Piasso at the beginning of December 2022. Within 2 weeks I had a working product live on the app store although I am only able to work on weekends. The app had 1 thousand user in the first weeks.

title: biddz
description: I was responsible for taking biddz from an idea in Michael's HÃ¶weler and Alex's Frank head to a real product being used by 10s of thousads of users. I conceptulized, designed and built the first version of the app. Then built a team of engineers, product manager and data analytics to continuiously improve the product.

title: Chair for Computational Social Sciences and Humanities
description: As one of the founding members of the M.Sc. Computational Social Systems I was solely responsible for the conceptualisation, design and development of the website.

title: Chair for Computational Social Sciences and Humanities
description: I was the 4th member to join the chair and was responsible for the conceptualisation, design and development of the website. In addition I also built various tools to automate the correction of the students' assignments.
